title: Earth Rugs 8.25" x 27" Oval Printed Braided Stair Treads (Set of 13) (Deer Pinecone)
features: Manufactured to the Highest Quality Available.
Great for dogs afraid to walk up those all wood stairs. No more slips and falls.
description: These durable braided stair tread are a great decoration as well as a great way to get some traction on those slippery wood stair cases. Soft hues continue into complementary border. Use in your basement or main staircase to offer decorative non-slip functionality. Can accent a nightstand or side table, too. Natural jute braid trivet printed with imagery by artist Phyllis Stevens. Reverses to a plain center for versatility. Spot clean with cold water as needed. Do not machine wash. Stair tread liners recommended. Imported. 8" x 27"
